title: Protecting Melissa
description: Melissa isn't looking for a man in her life since her husband was killed for his dubious business dealings before she learned about his secret life. She'd had a crush on Gabriel in her teens but now that she's his son's teacher, she can't afford to act on silly high school crushes.   Gabe remembers when Melissa followed him and her brother around. She's no kid and he wants more from her than he should. Now she's his son's teacher and she's in danger. How can he not protect her?
author: Mary Marvella
